attributes.action: Stop the plans for a longer school day and shorter summer holidays
attributes.additional_details: Children and teenagers are already sleep deprived, so making the school days longer would just add to their misery. The summer holidays are children's chance to recuperate from the academic year.
attributes.background: Keep the  school days the same as they are and kee the summer holidays the same length.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574585
